body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Alexander Gonzales and the customer's name is Amanda Morris.  The conversation is about Bob's Gym (a Gym ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling TechSol Support Center. My name is Amy. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Amy. My name is John.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble accessing my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, John. Could I have the email address associated with your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. I also need your phone number to verify your identity.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Awesome, thank you John. Let me quickly verify your information... Done! You should now have access to your account.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great! Thank you so much, Amy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day. Goodbye!
